alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Spalding, southeastern Fayette, northeastern Meriwether, northern Pike and southeastern Coweta Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Digbey, or 13 miles northwest of Zebulon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Zebulon, Brooks, Williamson, Haralson, Gay, Concord, Hilltop, Vaughn, Hollonville, Alvaton, Rover, Digbey, and Zetella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
